name: Emily Rabon
text: This is my go-to location for pizza. I always have a pleasant experience, but Anna is one of the most pleasant customer service employees I have ever encountered. The manager is great, too. This location has really made itself the easy choice against nearby alternatives.

name: Andrea Moore
text: Just got this and as you can see my order is over 40min late. The pizza is doughy and chewy.. It's undercooked. Do something abiyt this. Very disgusting to eat

name: Free And Blessed
text: I called the store and spoke with a nice lady. I went there today, to find out that Lady wrote me name down and fixed the situation. I decided to buy a second pizza, just because I wanted to. ‚Ä¶More

name: jess ica
text: Placed an order to pick up from the reserve-n-ready oven in the front so I didn‚Äôt get to interact with the employees. But our order was very good and it was done quickly and correctly. No hassle picking it up!

name: Marie Williams
text: Had an incredibly disappointing experience with an individual working the front desk who was rude and aggressive to both myself and my husband. It appears they need some serious training on customer service.

name: Jo Hill
text: Kids always love pizza and no one can beat the prices here.

name: Brian Case-Franko
text: Called twice to place an order and nobody would answer the phone. Called a third time and was placed on hold for several minutes before being hung up on. I guess they don't want to sell pizzas?

name: Steve Makgill
text: Great price and usually very fast service.  Call ahead on off times if you want it ready quickly or for special items.  Now they support their own app and you can order ahead easily, ready when you arrive.  Note on the picture - they've updated since that was taken.

name: Nicole Firth
text: Here now and they have a ‚Äúclosing early due to being short staffed at 4pm.‚Äù Yet there are 5 people in there right now walking around. Care to explain?

name: Brian Willis
text: Decent pizza for a dirt cheap price.  Fast and convenient.

name: Charles Keeling
text: Having been a steady customer for over 5 years, what brings me back time after time is that I found this to be the best pizza value in Raleigh.  You get a consistently good large pizza for a great price, and I happen to like the cheese, ‚Ä¶More

name: jonathan hayes
text: Pizza ready to carry out! Fast!   The black lady who works at lunch is so friendly and has a smile for her customers.  The lunch combo is a deal with a small deep dish and a soda for a bit over $5.  The deep dish has a combo of mozzarella abd Munster... So good.

name: Type056
text: My order was ready ahead of time, accurate, and the people here are as cool as cool can get!  Forget Papa John's and Domino's people, make Little Caesars THE PLACE to go for real pizza once again!

name: Emily Nelson
text: Okay pizze, GREAT price! Feed kids by the dozen!

name: Rph 2390
text: I love their cheese pizza

name: Donna Howard
text: Most of the time the pizza is good, but lately it has been stale. I bought 3 pizzas about 3 weeks ago, and all of them were stale. So they gave me two more for free, and tonight I just went in and got 2 more pizzas and the one that was in ‚Ä¶More

name: Alicia Williams
text: Walked in to ask a question about their pizzas because I was not familiar with the company. The two girls working responded rudely. "She know damn well we dont have small pizzas". They thought I should of known their pizzas come in only one size. I walked out and ordered from Jason's Delight. 12/13 @ 5:30 pm

name: Jerry Weese
text: The go to for quick decent pizza on a budget.

name: Bill Mcneely
text: Served quickly with a hot pizza - exactly what I went for

name: Susan Good
text: It's okay but their pizzas not all that great. I guess you get what you pay for. When I had to complain about the price that wasn't what I was told the woman at the counter got an attitude with me

name: Matt Phillips
text: I manage a bike shop behind this Little Caesar's on Spring Forest Rd in Raleigh, NC. Myself and my employees get pizza at this location regularly and I decided to get one for myself today and share it. The first odd thing I noticed was that ‚Ä¶More

name: R Welsh
text: I called at 8:30pm to place an order for carry out (they close at 9). After waiting over 2 minutes of ringing a lady finally answered and sounded very rude/annoyed. I told her id like to place an order for a pizza that takes 8 minutes to ‚Ä¶More

name: David Medlin
text: Quick and easy to go

name: Tonia Sebbe
text: The owner is shity as hell he doesn't treat his employee nice or with respect no less customers especially if they fix your pizza wrong and they're not that clean

name: Bonnie Dixon
text: The people that work there are very nice and the food is great my kids love it

name: Marcus Campbell
text: Fast and Friendly service

name: Daranta Parker
text: cheap pizza, but good

name: wayland etheridge
text: Friendly customer service.  Pizza looked like one for a advertising picture and tasted great too. Will be back again.

name: sean stephens
text: Love this pizza, great price, great deals.

name: Thomas Rudd
text: Always make good pizza and customer service has been great.  I grab a $5 pizza from them probably once every 1-2 weeks.

name: david h
text: My pizza was so old it was like cardboard and the bread sticks were the worst I've ever had. Only with this location do I ever have problems.

text: Gross

text: Pizza is always good cheese is our favorite

text: Delicious ,fresh and  good price
